title: 404. Q&AF: Selecting A Company With Great Culture, Mentality After Devastating Injury & Choosing Passion Over Profit
itunes:title: 404. Q&AF: Selecting A Company With Great Culture, Mentality After Devastating Injury & Choosing Passion Over Profit
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on what you should be on the lookout for in a company's culture when looking for a new job, why it's critical to develop mental toughness to power through the tough times in life, and how to seek out your passion while keeping your business running.
